de.weltraumschaf.dht.msg

Interface MessageBox

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMessageBox

    public interface MessageBox
    This type defines a post box like container for messages.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int count()
      Gets the total number of messages in the box.
      int countUnread()
      Gets the number of unread messages.
      Message get(int id) 
      Collection<Message> getAll()
      Get a immutable collection of all messages in the box.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Whether there are messages or not.
      void put(Message msg)
      Add a message in to the box.
      void remove(int id)
      Removes a message in the box.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        void put(Message msg)
        Add a message in to the box.
        Parameters:
        msg - must not be null

      • remove

        void remove(int id)
        Removes a message in the box.
        Parameters:
        id - must not be negative

      • countUnread

        int countUnread()
        Gets the number of unread messages. A message remains unread until you mark it read.
        Returns:
        never negative

      • count

        int count()
        Gets the total number of messages in the box.
        Returns:
        never negative

      • getAll

        Collection<Message> getAll()
        Get a immutable collection of all messages in the box.
        Returns:
        never null

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Whether there are messages or not.
        Returns:
        true if no messages were put in to the box, else false

      • get

        Message get(int id)
